textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Genetic Los Angeles founder Ali Fatourechi traveled the US for one year, meeting with over 20,000 customers to find out what they wanted out of their jeans. With this knowledge, as well as an eye for fit, he launched a premium denim line that takes inspiration from decades past while staying modern with edgy, confident silhouettes. Fatourechi's eye for style and underground cool, mixed with colors, washes, and cuts from around the world, has given Genetic Los Angeles jeans and apparel timeless appeal. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy.
